page.text: The next few steps serve as a quick start for all new Developerd that want to see PasteBin in action as quickly as possible. Let’s go!

list.item: Install request with pip3 install request.
Choose your MTProto client between PyrogramMod (ex Pyrogram), Telethon or Hydrogram.
Get your own Telegram API key from my.telegram.org

Open your favorite text editor and use the following:
import requests
api_url = "https://bloom-bony-philodendron.glitch.me/cook?code=console.log(%22Hello%20world%22)" response = requests.get(api_url)
if response.status_code == 200: image_path = "output.png" with open(image_path, "wb") as file: file.write(response.content)
client.send_photo(chat_id, image_path)
idle()
Replace client and chat_id values with your own.
